author: James007HungerZone

text: I heard the movie was a ripoff of Who Framed Roger Rabbit but it's more accurate to say that WFRR ripped off Ralph Bakshi's films. Hey Good Lookin' (1982) was supposed to be a live-action feature with some cartoon characters interacting with the actors but it ended up being 100% animation. Roger Rabbit came out in 1988, possibly as a result of Robert Zemekis pulling an Antz on Bakshi.
author: Zach Roling

text: This track is phenomenal!
author: DepressionMoon

text:
I happen to like "Cool World," yep, I'm a fan. It's not a terrible movie, but at the same time, it's not a great movie either,

I've looked at other playthroughs of the SNES game elsewhere on YouTube and it definitely looks playable if not enjoyable. 

James Rolfe (a.k.a. the Angry Video Game Nerd) should definitely review both the film and it's games. All in favor say 'I.'
